title: Monday column
author: VD
content_html: Today’s column concerns the economic situation, but it is, admittedly, a bit unusual. I don’t expect critical analysis or anything, but I shall be very disappointed in those who don’t recognize the source. And yes, I will be posting specific information about Voxiversity II later today.
content_text:
Today’s column concerns the economic situation, but it is, admittedly,
a bit unusual
.  I don’t expect critical analysis or anything, but I shall be very disappointed in those who don’t recognize the source.  And yes, I will be posting specific information about Voxiversity II later today.
